3@2.body:
Why do ZeroNet sites link to http://127.0.0.1:43110/... in the first place instead of using relative links?
A link to e.g. /1TaLk3zM7ZRskJvrh3ZNCDVGXvkJusPKQ should work equally well inside ZeroNet and would also work with proxies.
